abstract: Capmark Financial Group, the big commercial real estate lender, filed for bankruptcy on Sunday afternoon, becoming the latest victim of the troubles in the commercial real estate market.
snippet: Capmark Financial Group, the big commercial real estate lender, filed for bankruptcy on Sunday afternoon, becoming the latest victim of the troubles in the commercial real estate market.
lead_paragraph: Updated Oct. 25, 2009 | 5:48 p.m. The Capmark Financial Group, the big commercial real estate lender, filed for bankruptcy on Sunday afternoon, becoming the latest victim of the troubles in the commercial real estate market.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
